title: [K-12] Mixed-Methods Workshop for Analyzing Higher Education Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy (smartphone proficiency) and foundational learning design concepts
context.additional_context: Participants Primarily Consist of Adult Learners Who Focus on Experiencing University Educational Environments via VR Simulations and Analyzing Learner Experiences. Conducted in Smartphone-Based Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Participants gain the ability to systematically analyze higher education learning experiences using mixed methodologies.
Participants derive and interpret relationships between learning activities using the Qualitative Visual Network Analysis (VNA) tool.
Participants can generate actionable insights for improving learning design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
